name: Amazon Prime Access
description: Prime membership for $6.99/month for eligible government assistance recipients or income verified customers; new customers start with a free 30-day trial
fullDescription: Amazon is the world's largest online retailer. Prime Access offers a discounted Prime membership for those receiving government assistance, providing free shipping, streaming, and more.
whatTheyOffer:
- Discounted Prime membership at $6.99/month (regularly $14.99/month)
- Free two-day shipping on millions of items
- Prime Video streaming (movies, TV shows)
- Prime Music, Prime Reading, and more
- 30-day free trial for new customers
howToGetIt:
1. Visit amazon.com/primeaccess
2. Verify eligibility through EBT card or government assistance documentation
3. Or verify income through a third-party service
4. Complete enrollment and start your membership
5. Re-verify eligibility every 12 months
